MODULE.name: VOICE_MODULE_WV
MODULE.description:
Wide Voice algorithm in the voice decoder postprocessor
This module#[ #] supports the following parameter IDs:
VOICE_PARAM_MOD_ENABLE
VOICE_PARAM_WV

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables/disables this feature

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client should set this field to zero.

PARAMETER.name: VOICE_PARAM_WV
PARAMETER.description: Wide Voice algorithm.\nFixed size for this parameter\nVersion 0 â€“ 44 bytes

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: adaptive_bass_boost_voiced
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: To turn this off, this flag needs to be undefined (set to 0). This can be done by commenting out the flag definition in#[ #] defines.h.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fixed_bass_boost_9dB
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: To turn this off, this flag needs to be undefined. This can be done by commenting out the flag definition in defines.h.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: high_band_contrib
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Increasing this factor will cause the wideband signal to have higher highband component

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: low_band_contrib
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Increasing this factor will cause the wideband signal to have higher lowband component

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: nfact
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Increasing this#[ #] will effectively cause an increase in the amount of modulated noise that is added to the estimated highband excitation.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: noise_mix_factor_alpha
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Increasing this will effectively cause an increase in the amount of modulated noise that is added to the estimated highband#[ #] excitation.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: noise_mix_factor_beta
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Increasing this will effectively cause an increase in the amount of modulated noise that is added to the estimated highband#[ #] excitation.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client should set this#[ #] field to zero.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: silence_hb_egy_attn
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Increasing this will cause the energy of the highband in the speech pauses to be lower

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: smf_sens_cntrl
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Increase in#[ #] this value will cause the present frame highband gain to be smoothed less with respect to the previous frame

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: speech_buffer_len
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Changing#[ #] this will allow segments shorter or longer than 20 msecs to be bandwidth extended. Additional changes may need to be made to make this work.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: tilt_scal_fac
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Increasing#[ #] this parameter causes the energy of the highband for unvoiced frames with positive tilts to be higher. However the cap on the multiplicative#[ #] factor limits the increase in the highband energy

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client should set#[ #] this field to zero.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: unvoiced_highband_gain_cap
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Increase in this value will allow highband energy to have larger values

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: voiced_egy_map_alpha
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Increase in this value will cause the highband to have more energy in voiced frames

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client should set#[ #] this field to zero.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: voiced_egy_map_beta
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Increase in this value will cause the highband to have more energy in voiced frames

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: voiced_pitchgain_limit
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Decreasing this limit will cause more frames to be classified as voiced. All such frames will have a highband extension similar to that#[ #] of voiced frames

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: voiced_tilt_limit
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Increasing this limit will cause more frames to be classified as voiced. All such frames will have a highband extension similar to that#[ #] of voiced frames
